name: Lunaculture
description:
Our submission for Ludum Dare 52!

Lunaculture is a game where you farm plants on a purple moon called Iridium. Grow your crops to meet the demand of the (offscreen) colony and get paid in credits.

Reach your weekly credit selling goal to unlock new crops, machines and buildings to expand your farm!

Controls

- WASD: Move

- Left Click: Interact

- E: Open Inventory

- R: Open Buy/Sell Menu

- Left Shift + Left Click: In Sell menu, will sell the entire stack.

- 1-9: Hotbar Navigation

Complete the 9 credit quotas to beat the game! Play however you'd like, turn your brain off and get planting!

Made by Auros, Bobbie (legoandmars), and Caeden117.

Note: The Windows binary has increased visual quality. If you have really underpowered hardware, you should stick to the WebGL version.
